NoWorkshop: ปิดการใช้งานแพ็กเกจเวิร์กชอป
ExcludeAll: Remove all items from your active playset
ExcludeAllDisabled: Remove all disabled items from your active playset
IncludeAll: Add all items to your active playset
ExcludeAllFiltered: Remove filtered items from your active playset
ExcludeAllDisabledFiltered: Remove filtered & disabled items from your active playset
IncludeAllFiltered: Add filtered items to your active playset
ExcludeAllSelected: Remove selected items from your active playset
ExcludeAllDisabledSelected: Remove selected & disabled items from your active playset
IncludeAllSelected: Add selected items to your active playset

CopyWorkshopLink.One: คัดลอกลิงก์ PDX Mods
CopyWorkshopLink.Plural: คัดลอกลิงก์ PDX Mods ของแพ็กเกจที่เลือก

CopyWorkshopMarkdownLink.One: Copy PDX Mods link as Markdown
CopyWorkshopMarkdownLink.Plural: Copy the selected packages' PDX Mods links as Markdown

CopyWorkshopId.One: คัดลอก PDX Mods ID
CopyWorkshopId.Plural: คัดลอก PDX Mods ID ของแพ็กเกจที่เลือก

LaunchThroughCities: เปิดเกมผ่านทาง Cities2.exe
IncludeItem: เพิ่มไปยังเพลย์เซ็ตที่ใช้งานอยู่
ExcludeItem: ลบออกจากเพลย์เซ็ตที่ใช้งานอยู่

SubscribeToItem.One: เพิ่มไปยังเพลย์เซ็ตที่ใช้งานอยู่
SubscribeToItem.Plural: เพิ่มเหล่านี้ไปยังเพลย์เซ็ตที่ใช้งานอยู่

IncludeThisItemInAllPlaysets.One: เพิ่มไปยังเพลย์เซ็ตทั้งหมดของคุณ
IncludeThisItemInAllPlaysets.Plural: เพิ่มไอเทมที่เลือกไปยังเพลย์เซ็ตทั้งหมดของคุณ

ExcludeThisItemInAllPlaysets.One: ลบออกจากเพลย์เซ็ตทั้งหมดของคุณ
ExcludeThisItemInAllPlaysets.Plural: Remove the selected items from all your playsets

PackageIsUnknown: The information from PDX Mods hasn't loaded for '{0}' yet
PackageIsIncomplete: The local size of '{0}' ({1}) is different than PDX Mods' {2}
OpenCitiesAppData: เปิดโฟลเดอร์ AppData ของ C:S II
ResetSteamCache: เคลียร์แคชของ PDX Mods
ParadoxLoginFailedTitle: คุณไม่สามารถลงชื่อเพื่อเข้าใช้ PDX Mods ได้
ParadoxLoginFailedNoConnection: You're not connected to the internet, please check your connection and click here to try again.
ParadoxLoginFailedBadCredentials: Your saved username/password failed to log in. Click here to update your information.
ParadoxLoginFailedEmpty: Your session has likely expired. Try launching the game to log in again, or click here to log in through Skyve.
Downloading: กำลังดาวน์โหลด...

ModsDownloadFailed.One: ล้มเหลวในการดาวน์โหลดม็อด
ModsDownloadFailed.Plural: การดาวน์โหลดม็อดบางตัวล้มเหลว

LoginToParadox: ลงชื่อเข้าใช้ Paradox
LoginFailed: Login failed, make sure your e-mail and password are correct. Or try again later.
RememberMeInfo: * Your credentials will be encrypted and saved to your computer.
LoginDisclaimer: The login process is securely handled through Paradox services and no data is shared with Skyve.
DropNewPlayset: Drop or select a playset's file here to import it
FilterIncludedByDefault: Enable 'Included' filter for local content by default
FilterIncludedByDefault_Tip: Only shows local content that are included in your active playset by default.
RunSetupOrRunApp:
You can't run Skyve from this folder. If you've installed it already, run it from your Programs list.

If not, click on 'Ok' to run the setup.
CantRunAppFromHere:
You can't run Skyve from this folder.

Either run the app from your Programs list, or run the Skyve Setup from the mod's folder.
UpdateAvailable: พร้อมอัปเดต
UpdateAvailableInfo: คลิกที่นี่เพื่ออัปเดต Skyve
VoteMod: ชอบม็อดนี้
UnVoteMod: เลิกชอบม็อดนี้
LogLevel: ระดับการจดบันทึก
LoggingIn: กำลังเข้าสู่ระบบ...
NotLoggedInCheckNotification: You're not logged in to Paradox, check your notifications for more information.
HideUserSection: Hide your profile in the main menu
DeveloperMode: เปิดใช้โหมดผู้พัฒนา
LogsToPlayerLog: คัดลอกบันทึกไป Player.log
InvalidFolderSettingsInfo:
Skyve was not able to properly detect Cities: Skylines II's data folder.

Click here to manually select the data folder.
SkyvenotSetUpInfo:
Skyve was not set up yet. Please launch Cities: Skylines II with Skyve enabled to complete the setup.

Make sure mods load successfully, and if not, try creating a new playset with only Skyve included in it.
InvalidFolderSettingsFail: The selected path is not correct. Please select the 'Cities Skylines II' folder in your app data.
JunctionDescription:
Change the location where the game stores its content. This includes any mods, assets, and settings.

Skyve will create a link between your desired location and the default app data folder in this process.
CurrentStatus: สถานะปัจจุบัน:
JunctionRestart:
Skyve and Cities: Skylines II will close during this process.

Skyve will restart automatically once finished.
PlaysetAlreadyImported: This playset is already present in your list of playsets.
JunctionInvalidFolder: The selected folder is not a valid destination. Please try another one.
CouldNotRetrieveMods: Could not retrieve the mods' data
NewGameUpdateInfo:
Patch {0} is now available.
Be sure to check your compatibility report before starting your game.
PdxSyncInfo: The PDX Synchronization process handles downloading and updating your mods, as well as synchronizing the settings and playsets you have between your local computer and PDX Mods services.
PDXModsUpdated: อัปเดตเมื่อไม่นานมานี้บน PDX Mods
DiskStatus: สถานะดีสก์
TotalCitiesSize: Total C:S II User Data Stored

LowSpaceCreateJunction.Zero: You're running out of disk space, you need to clear up some storage or get an additional hard disk.
LowSpaceCreateJunction.One: You're running out of disk space, go to the options to change the location where the game's content is saved.

ModsYouAreAddingRequireDependencies.Plural: The packages you're adding have dependencies

AddingDependencies.One:
'{1}' is required for the mod(s) you're adding.

Would you like to also add '{1}' to your playset?
AddingDependencies.Plural:
The mod(s) you're adding have {0} dependencies: {1}

Would you like to also add them to your playset?

DependencyResolution_Tip: Choose what will happen when you add a mod with dependencies that you do not have.
SyncOngoingLaunchGame:
Skyve is still synchronizing your mods, would you like to launch the game once your mods are ready?
Select 'No' to start the game anyway.
StartingWithNoPlayset:
You're about to launch the game with no active playset.
This means that no mods will be enabled in the game.
SyncBeforeLaunching: Synchronize mods before launching the game
SyncBeforeLaunching_Tip: Runs a mod sync before launching to make sure all mods are up to date.
SafeModeInfo:
Launch the game in 'Safe Mode' to help identify issues with crashes.

It is hard to identify the source of a crash, and makes recovering a save impossible sometimes.
Safe mode allows the game to avoid crashes in most cases which lets you recover a save, and properly logs errors to be analysed by tech support.
ParadoxContextFailedInfo:
Something is causing the paradox backend to fail.
Click this message to try and repair it.

If the repair is not successful, ask for help on tech support forums.
BackupServiceUnavailable: The Skyve service is not installed. Automatic backups will only work while the Skyve app is open.
CorruptedSettingsFilesBackupAvailable:
Skyve has found available backups to restore your settings to their previous state.

Click here to restore them now.
CorruptedSettingsFilesNoBackup:
No backups are available to restore your settings. Set up your backup settings to safeguard your settings in the future.

Click here to delete the corrupted files.
